name: Jump Reaper
description:
> Please write a comment if it doesn't work on your browser to let me know! <

Jump to the top and meet a hot babe!  (jk, this is a very early prototype so there's nothing there yet! just jump around for now sorry!)

On Desktop Browser:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Jump with Spacebar or Left Click.

On Mobile:

  • Move with the Joystick on the Left Side of the screen.
  • Jump by pressing the Right Side of the screen.

Credits:

  • Calli sprites by @pixelartstudent
  • Pixel art assets by Pixel Frog and Igor Gundare
  • SFX: Deva
  • Music: Lively Bopping to Death's Knocking · Mori Calliope
